医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
与儿童二手暴露有关的大麻烟雾该研究将吸烟中的家庭大麻与儿童的THC水平升高联系起来，这突出了需要采取干预措施来降低二手暴露风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/cannabis-smoke-at-home-linked-to-secondhand-home-centhand-endhand-en-exposure-in-Children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/cannabis-smoke-at-home-linked-to-secondhand-home-condhand-enpose-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=049fd30b-5364-4515-9829-ab56e1810f5a Mon, 27 Jan 2025 05:13:00 -0500 Cannabis smoke at home linked to secondhand exposure in children
饮食干预恢复肠道微生物组，并提供防止慢性疾病的保护研究结果表明，微生物组恢复饮食可改善肠道健康并减少慢性病标志物，突出其心脏代谢益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/dietary-intervention-restores-gut-microbiome-and-robiome-and-robiome-and-protection-protection-against-chronic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/dietary-intervention-restores-gut-microbiome-and-microbiome-and-robiome-and-protection-protection-against-chronic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7183d91-9d33-449a-8632-05211ec7c192 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 04:42:00 -0500 Dietary intervention restores gut microbiome and offers protection against chronic diseases
研究表明，诊断为多动症的成年人的预期寿命不足一项研究表明，患有多动症的英国成年人的预期寿命比普通人群低6.78年，这强调了改善医疗保健支持的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-reveals-simnificant-life-expectancy-deeficit-in-in-Adults-with-dia-dia-dia-dia-diagith-diaghd diarsed-adhd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-reveals-simenfificant-life-prectancy-deeficit--deficit--in-aptults-with-diad-diad-diate-diathed-adhd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B0B0857B-6101-4358-8B16-EB658D23DD6B Mon, 27 Jan 2025 04:16:00 -0500 Study reveals significant life expectancy deficit in adults with diagnosed ADHD

研究揭示了体育活动对健康衰老的重要性体育锻炼可以延长老年人的寿命吗？发表在CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）上的评论文章https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.231336总结了支持体育活动在预防或减少疾病影响方面的重要作用的大量证据并讨论如何为老年人开出有效的运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-reveals-the-importance-emportance-of-physical-achysical-activity-for for-Healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-reveals-the-importance-the-importance-of-physical-achysical-activity-for for-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5E04E60-2C78-40A8-9CEC-549CBD23412F Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:58:56 -0500 Study reveals the importance of physical activity for healthy aging
肿瘤扩散的早期检测改善了治疗结果Niigata University由神经外科研究所的神经外科研究所领导的小组成功地诊断了弥漫性中线神经胶质瘤中瘦脑疾病的诊断，方法是从这些患者手中从这些患者中循环的肿瘤DNA中检测出H3K27M-突变液滴。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/early-detection-of-tumor-spread-impread-improves-wareatment-utcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/early-detection-of-tumor-spread-impread-improves-wareatment-unatment-uncomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3e5d292-45ec-45ec-4b7b-930f-540c3bdbdab4 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:50:33 -0500 Early detection of tumor spread improves treatment outcomes
研究人员揭示了质地和品味在转移到行星饮食中的作用研究人员建议，了解肉质品味和质地背后的科学可能是更多人转向行星友好的植物饮食的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/researchers-reveal-the-the-the-the-------texture-and-taste-in--taste-in-shifting-to-to-to-a-planet-flanet-franet-franet-franet-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/researchers-reveal-the-the-the-the--texture--texture-and-taste-in-shifting-in-shifting-to-planet-planet-franet-franet-franet-franet-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AB828177-C5B1-4351-4351-8ACC-BDDA4E7630A4 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:37:26 -0500 Researchers reveal the role of texture and taste in shifting to a planet-friendly diet
罗斯程序为年轻患者提供持久的结果接受ROSS疾病手术的年轻患者表现出了出色的长期生存期，大多数人无需二十年后进行额外的手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/ross-procedure-offers-durable-results-in-young-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/ross-procedure-offers-durable-rasult-results-in-young-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B46D2873-5F86-4196-99AC-F455353DEC99 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:29:59 -0500 Ross procedure offers durable results in young patients
严重肺气肿患者的LVR可能胜过EBV随着当代手术实践的不断发展，患有外科肺量减少（LVR）的患者的高级肺气肿可能会比过去更长，并发症更少，并且甚至比选择内乘阀的患者（EBV）的票价更高（ ）放置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/lvrs-may-ustperform-ebv-in-patients-with-severe-emphysema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/lvrs-may-ustperform-ebv-in-patients-with-severe-emphysema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A9F3AB78-6C51-48D9-A5BA-DBD2E9C91DB6 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:19:55 -0500 LVRS may outperform EBV in patients with severe emphysema
